name: Skateboard Rush
description:
Skateboard Runner is a fun free skateboarding game where you have to dodge traffic, jump cars, duck under obstacles and get as far as you can.

If you love skateboarding games in 3d you will find this game easy and fun to play.

- Great 3D graphics
- Skate and unlock power ups such as bombs, time effects and invincibility

Skateboard Runner brings all the fun of skateboarding games to your mobile device allowing you to ride in 8 completely unique locations. Jump on your board, learn new moves and improve your skate skills to land sick combos.
